Account_Name.description: Select the account related to the contact.

id.description: The id of the account related to the contact.

name.description: The name of the account related to the contact.

Amount.description: Specify the amount that can be expected after closing the deal.

Campaign_Source.description: Select the campaign related to the deal.

Closing_Date.description: Specify or select the expected close date. This field is mandatory.

Created_By.description: Displays name of the user created the contact first time.

email.description: Email of the user created the contact first time

id.description: Id of the user created the contact first time

name.description: Name of the user created the contact first time

Created_Time.description: Created datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFS    ET

Description.description: Specify any other details about deal.

Expected_Revenue.description: Calculated based on the Amount and deal Stage that you specify

Last_Activity_Time.description: Unclear: Possibly last user activity datetime in ISO format   : YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Lead_Source.description: select the lead source from the drop-down list

email.description: Email of the user modified the deal.

id.description: Id of the user modified the deal.

name.description: Name of the user modified the deal.

Next_Step.description: Specify the next step of the sales process.

email.description: Email of the user to whom the deal is assigned.

id.description: id of the user to whom the deal is assigned.

name.description: name of the user to whom the deal is assigned.

Probability.description: Specify the probability of closing a dea

Stage.description: Select the sales stage from the drop-down list. This field is mandatory.

Type.description: Select the type of deal (New Business or Existing Business) from the drop-down list.
